name: Monsters of the Blood Moon
description:
Blood Moon appears every 1000 years and when it does.....it brings deadly monsters along with it. Shoot them all down with just ONE BULLET and save the day.

Instructions: 

A and D to move left and right. Use ur mouse to rotate the player. 

Don't let the monster reach u and always make sure to catch ur bullet. If not....hmmm....ur dead :)

Except audio, all the other assets are original :)
